messages.original: It disappeared after a few seconds. Nothing is detected at the moment.
The missile which was briefly detected was a Russian S-300/400 air defence missile targeting Ukrainian UAVs near Sevastopol, Crimea.

Ukrainian drone(s) have struck a Russian "Hunter" Patrol and Guard Ship. 
No details yet. The Ukrainian SOF has only published this image.
Trump is expected to issue his statement shortly.
Aerial target detected, flying to Pivdenne/Dobroslav, Odesa Oblast.
Aerial target detected, flying to Pivdenne/Dobroslav, Odesa Oblast.

So far today, 6 Iskander-M ballistic missiles have been used against Odesa Oblast. 
4 have targeted the Dobroslav area.
2 have targeted the Mayaky Bridge.
This is in addition to numerous Geran-2 drone strikes.
Trump is expected to issue his statement shortly.
Nothing interesting. The speech is unrelated to Venezuela.

Deep State on the dire situation of Gulyaypole:
The Ukrainian military resource Deep State reports on the risk of losing Gulyaypole due to management problems and internal sabotage in the 102nd Territorial Defense Brigade. According to DS, some officers are persuading fighters to abandon their positions without authorization, while the units are not aware of the current situation of their neighbors, which leads to disorientation and additional losses.

üá∫üá¶
 Deep State on the dire situation of Gulyaypole:  The Ukrainian military resource Deep State reports on the risk of losing Gulyaypole due to management problems and internal sabotage in the 102nd Territorial Defense Brigade. According to DS, some officers‚Ä¶

The 102nd brigade has mostly been withdrawn to the rear now due to heavy losses from the encirclements east of Hulyaipole, lack of coordination, constant Russian bombardment, and low-quality fortifications. 
The issues in this unit have been known for some time, and the casualties they suffered prior to the Russian entry into Hulyaipole had meant they couldn't perform properly. This is the main reason why defences are collapsing there right now. The higher command is blame.
Deepstate published satellite imagery showing the ruins of eastern Siversk. Around 300-400 civilians remained in the city for the nearly 4 years of fighting.

2 of the Iskanders which I previously thought targeted Dobroslav, Odesa Oblast, actually hit port infrastructure near Pivdenne.
At least 7 civilians were killed and 15 others injured.

Russia and Ukraine Exchange Strikes: Odesa in Energy Crisis, Oil Tanker Hit in Mediterranean
According to the Ukrainian Air Force Command, overnight on December 18-19, Russian forces attacked Ukraine with a barrage of 160 strike drones (UAVs). The Ukrainian side reported that 108 of these drones were shot down or suppressed by air defense.¬†Russia, for its part,¬†reported destroying 94 Ukrainian UAVs over its own territory, the highest number¬†in¬†the Rostov region.
The hottest spot within Ukraine remained the Odesa region, where strikes on bridges and substations intensified the crisis. The Ukrainian side also acknowledged the loss of an Mi-8 helicopter, presumed shot down by a "Geran" drone using an R-60 air-to-air missile during an interception mission.
Also, the Security Service of Ukraine reported that its special unit "Alpha" carried out an attack by aerial drones on the Omani-flagged oil tanker QENDIL in neutral waters of the Mediterranean Sea, over 2000 km from Ukraine.
üëâ

Trump Says War With Venezuela Possible Amid Notable Uptake In U.S. Aerial Activities Nearby (Video)
President Donald Trump said on December 18 that he is leaving the possibility of a war with Venezuela on the table, amid a notable increase in U.S. military activities in both the Caribbean Sea and the Eastern Pacific Ocean.
Earlier in the week, Trump ordered a naval blockade of all oil tankers, which are under U.S. sanctions, entering and leaving Venezuelan ports. A few days before announcing the blockade, the U.S. seized the Skipper oil tanker off the coast of Venezuela.
These developments represented a major escalation in the U.S. pressure campaign against Venezuela, which began in October and spun a military operation against drug traffickers later in September.
‚ÄúI don‚Äôt rule it out, no,‚Äù Trump told NBC News in a phone interview.
üëâ

Russian Army Is Storming Last Ukrainian Pockets In Myrnohrad (Videos)
On December 19, the Russian military began storming the last districts under Ukrainian control in the city of Myrnohrad, also known as Dimitrov, in a final push to capture the city
.
The Tsentr [Center] Group of Forces managed to secure most of these districts, according to preliminary reports. In other parts of the city Myrnohrad, especially the southeastern part, Kiev forces are said to be making their last stand in small isolated pockets.
The number of Ukrainian troops besieged in Myrnohrad could be in the thousands. Their fate will likely be decided in the next few days, if not hours.
A withdrawal is out of question for these troops, especially that the Tsentr Group of Forces has expanded its control to the north of the nearby city of Pokrovsk tightening the siege imposed on Myrnohrad. Still, Kiev could order a suicidal break out attempt.
üëâ

Ukrainian Troops In Huliaipole Are In State Of Panic (Videos)
Recent advance by the Russian military in the key city of Huliaipole in Zaporozhye has caused a state of panic in the ranks of Ukrainian formations fighting there, Ukrainian media acknowledged on December 19.
Russian President Vladimir Putin even confirmed during his annual end of the year Direct Line event that at least 50% of the city is under the control of the Vostok Group of Forces.
In a shocking report, the pro-Kiev Deep State telegram channel revealed that the rapid advance by the Vostok Group of Forces had a major impact on the morale of Ukrainian formations fighting in the city and around it.
Read more

Pokrovsk Sector: Russian Army Expels Ukrainian Forces From Rodynske And Assaults Hrishyne
Complete control of Rodynske has been established in the Pokrovsk sector. Fierce fighting continues in Hrishyne. In the Dobropillia salient, units have regained control of a section of the highway near Zolotyi Kolodiaz. 
The December European Union summit was characterized by western media as a series of major political defeats.
